Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Pendant
Description: Flat, oval-shaped pendant, perfectly polished and pierced at the top of one of the small sides. The beauty of this jewel resides essentially in the quality of the material used: a brown-black stone with veins and specks of white quartz, probably a type of granite.
